meanings.definition: An assembly of the wise men in Anglo-Saxon England.
meanings.sent1: The witenagemote gathered to discuss important matters.
meanings.sent2: The witenagemote met to make decisions for the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The witenagemote had a lively debate about the harvest.
meanings.sent4: In the witenagemote of nature, the bees were the wise council.
meanings.sent5: The image of the witenagemote was etched in history books.

meanings.definition: A council or assembly of nobles and high officials in medieval England.
meanings.sent1: The witenagemote advised the king on matters of state.
meanings.sent2: Nobles and officials gathered in the witenagemote to discuss laws.
meanings.sent3: The witenagemote banquet was a grand affair.
meanings.sent4: The witenagemote stood as a beacon of authority in the land.
meanings.sent5: The witenagemote's decisions shaped the course of history.
